General.Name: Spacefy Inc
General.Description: Spacefy Inc. operates an online marketplace that connects individuals and businesses in the creative industry to space owners who provide locations to their project needs in the Canada and internationally. It operates in Spaces and Creatives segments. The company provides a marketplace where property owners and/or managers of venues can showcase their properties complete with detailed descriptions, photographs, and descriptions of various amenities. Its platform connects individuals or businesses with venue owners to find and book short-term locations, such as houses and condos, restaurants and bars, professional photography and music studios, vacant retail shops, event venues, or farms. The company serves photographers, filmmakers, musicians, artists, ad agencies, and event planners. Spacefy Inc. was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 1 University Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2P1
